title: Is the BlackBerry Curve 9320 still usable in 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. If all you need is a phone which can call and message it works perfectly. Everything else is a total no. Think no social media (Facebook, YouTube etc.) No Whatsapp, no bbm as well since you need BIS for 9320 and no service provider has it available. I have a 9320 as my Emergency backup phone in my car glove box. Have had to only use it once and it did the job!

It needs the BIS network to work (BlackBerry Internet Service) and that is still running on a few carriers. Unfortunately the list is becoming shorter and shorter. Many carriers no longer handle BlackBerry Plans as the last BBOS device was released somewhere around 2013 (about the same time as the Z10). The 9320 will then work for texts and phone calls but not much else as it needs BIS for email, BBM and browsing.
